description: portrait of a figure wearing a green hat, with bright green round eyes; red face; smiling mouth with teeth visible; orange hands with all five fingers--including thumbs--nearly the same length; figure wears a black coat with orange trim and three large red dots/buttons down front; white collar; green and white ground; primitive style; thick pigments; gold frame
